classification_data.text: COMPOSICION ACCIONARIA CERTIFICACIÓN DEL CONTADOR PÚBLICO El suscrito Contador Público de LA EMPRESA ROMEGAS SAS., identificada con NIT 900.127.447 - 1, hace constar que, de acuerdo con el libro oficial de registro de accionistas, inscrito en el registro mercantil, CERTIFICA QUE: La composición accionaria es la siguiente: Se expide a los veinticinco (31) días del mes de mayo de 2023 Cordialmente, LAURA I. OVIEDO GOMEZ TP 304428 – T CONTADORA PÚBLICA DOCUMENTO ACCIONISTAS % PARTICIPACION ACCIONES SUSCRITAS VALOR NOMINAL CC. 79.735.871 JULIO CESAR ROMERO MUÑOZ 100% 2.000 $10.000 TOTAL 100% 2.000 $10.000

content.thinking: Following the classification workflow: 1. **TEXT EXTRACTION** I can see that the document contains text in Spanish about "COMPOSICION ACCIONARIA" (Shareholder Composition). The document shows: - Title: "COMPOSICION ACCIONARIA" - "CERTIFICACIÓN DEL CONTADOR PÚBLICO" - Company: "LA EMPRESA ROMEGAS SAS., identificada con NIT 900.127.447 - 1" - A certification that shows the shareholder composition - A table showing: - CC. 79.735.871 JULIO CESAR ROMERO MUÑOZ - 100% - 2.000 acciones - $10.000 - TOTAL - 100% - 2.000 - $10.000 - Date: May 31, 2023 - Signed by: LAURA I. OVIEDO GOMEZ - TP 304428 – T - CONTADORA PÚBLICA 2. **PRIORITY CHECKS** - Not BLANK: has significant content - Not LINK_ONLY: no hyperlinks/URLs 3. **DOCUMENT FUNCTION ANALYSIS** The MAIN PURPOSE of this document is to show the shareholding composition of a company. It clearly shows: - Percentage of participation (100%) - Number of shares (2,000 shares) - Value/capital ($10,000) - Shareholder information (name and ID) This is clearly ACC indicative as it shows shareholding composition. 4. **ISSUER IDENTIFICATION** The document is issued by a public accountant (CONTADORA PÚBLICA) on behalf of the company, not by a government authority like Chamber of Commerce or tax authority. This supports ACC classification. 5. **CATEGORY CLASSIFICATION** Looking at the categories in order: - CECRL: No, this is not a personal identification document - CERL: Negative, as the document originates from the company's accountant rather than the Chamber of Commerce - ACC: Confirmed positive match The document definitively meets ACC category criteria with comprehensive shareholder details, including full ownership percentage, share count, and capital contribution.
